Answer: Presumably you mean “as much energy as Bitcoin". There are many other crypto coins which are less energy intensive and some many times less energy intensive. Bitcoin, however, is the incumbent and hard to knock off from its perch because rewarding “mining" helps incentiveise the use of Bitcoin.
